General.Name: Danal Co. Ltd
General.Description: Danal Co., Ltd. provides wired/wireless phone payment services in South Korea. It offers mobile, credit cards, virtual accounts, and barcodes payment services, as well as ringtones, ring-back tones, and content services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
General.Address: Bundang First Tower, Seongnam-si, South Korea, 463-824

1.Name: Mr. Byung-Woo  Choi
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer and Chief Fin. Officer
